title: Normani Attends Fan’s Graduation
content: I love you so much. Thank you for everything you do. You made an amazing day even more special. I can’t wait until you show the world what they’ve been missing. It’s not everyday your idol comes to your graduation for you and your bestfriend.  @Normani  @GucciGabby3  pic.twitter.com/aOzCgdEzLV    — gabriel lowell (@GABELOWELL) June 1, 2018       Noramni Kordei made on fan’s dream come true yesterday, June 1. The lucky fan had originally created a video asking the singer to his prom, but due to scheduling conflicts she could not go.    Instead, Normani bought a ticket and watched the fan and his friend receive their diplomas. She also hung out with the two after the ceremony.    How do you top this at your high school Graduation! I hope Normani had fun.
contentWithMarkup:
I love you so much. Thank you for everything you do. You made an amazing day even more special. I can’t wait until you show the world what they’ve been missing. It’s not everyday your idol comes to your graduation for you and your bestfriend. @Normani @GucciGabby3 pic.twitter.com/aOzCgdEzLV

— gabriel lowell (@GABELOWELL) June 1, 2018

Noramni Kordei made on fan’s dream come true yesterday, June 1. The lucky fan had originally created a video asking the singer to his prom, but due to scheduling conflicts she could not go.

Instead, Normani bought a ticket and watched the fan and his friend receive their diplomas. She also hung out with the two after the ceremony.

How do you top this at your high school Graduation! I hope Normani had fun.
